amendatorysection.catchline: Game and Parks Commission Educational Fund; created; use; investment.
amendatorysection.para: The Game and Parks Commission Educational Fund is created. The fund shall consist of money credited pursuant to section 60-3,227 and any other money as determined by the Legislature. The commission shall use the fund to provide youth education programs relating to wildlife conservation practices. Any money in the fund available for investment shall be invested by the state investment officer pursuant to the Nebraska Capital Expansion Act and the Nebraska State Funds Investment Act.

crossreference.para: Nebraska Capital Expansion Act, see section 72-1269.
Nebraska State Funds Investment Act, see section 72-1260.
